text: "I'll See You in My Dreams" is a 2021 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is the third single and promotional single from his 20th studio album Letter to You. It went to number 21 on the Billboard Digital Song Sales charts and was dedicated in memory of music executive Michael Gudinski. It was the closing track to the album. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Heartland rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: I'll See You in My Dreams (Bruce Springsteen song)
